channel.title: compressed air leaking from my suit??
channel.description:
I feel like a real dork :retard: for asking this, but I must, for it is causing me game-play problems...
There is this compressed air coming from Freeman that makes crates (and other loose objects) fly away as I approach. WHAT is that? Is there a toggle switch?
Also, not sure if this related to the above, but objects are falling through the floor! Bodies, found ammunition, health packs, Freeman-upon-dying What is up with that!?:what:
Post 2: Okay, there is definitely something wrong when crates are seamlessly flying through fences. How do I correct this? [quote="ssturbo"] I feel like a real dork :retard: for asking this, but I must, for it is causing me game-play problems...
There is this compressed air coming from Freeman that makes crates (and other loose objects) fly away as I approach. WHAT is that? Is there a toggle switch?
Also, not sure if this related to the above, but objects are falling through the floor! Bodies, found ammunition, health packs, Freeman-upon-dying What is up with that!?:what: [/quote] I reckon there is a fix, other than restarting the game. :freeman:
Post 3: [quote="ssturbo"] Okay, there is definitely something wrong when crates are seamlessly flying through fences. How do I correct this? [/quote]

item.title: compressed air leaking from my suit??
item.dc:creator: ssturbo
item.description:
Thanks for noticing, but I didn’t do that
I had posted three separate posts, which were amalgamated automatically (perhaps since no else had yet posted) or by a forum moderator.

Mabilis:

[COLOR=‘0x111111’]I like how you quote yourself within the same comment.

Read full topic

item.title: compressed air leaking from my suit??
item.dc:creator: MSKyuuni
item.description:
Oh, this. I sometimes find it when starting a new game from “Forget About Freeman”. I’ve only seen it in Black Mesa though, and it’s actually sort of fun until you die and end up flying through the void forever. Enough descriptions though, close the game and try again.

Read full topic
item.source: compressed air leaking from my suit??

item.title: compressed air leaking from my suit??
item.dc:creator: JeffMOD
item.description:
It’s a physics error that sometimes show up in Source games. I can’t seem to remember why it happens, but restarting the game should fix it. Other than that, I don’t think it can be fixed while ingame.

Read full topic
item.source: compressed air leaking from my suit??

item.description:
Shit, how do I even recreate this? I’ve never seen this glitch ever in any source game\mod and I really want to.
